mapper.select: SELECT mu.menu_id, mu.url FROM user_info ui INNER JOIN user_role ur ON ( ui.user_id = ur.user_id AND ur.status=0 ) INNER JOIN role_menu rm ON ( ur.role_id = rm.role_id AND rm.delete_flg=0 ) INNER JOIN menu_info mi ON ( rm.menu_id = mi.menu_id AND mi.delete_flg=0 ) INNER JOIN menu_url mu ON ( mi.menu_id = mu.menu_id AND mu.delete_flg=0 ) WHERE ui.status =0 AND ui.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mu.url=#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
